desc: La Maison du Savon is a boutique brand specializes in atmosphere products for body and home. Decorative scented candles, diffusers, home sprays, body mists, body butters, soaps, shea bars and perfumes . The products are natural, 100% handmade from the best quality ingredients. Everything is selected with great care.

layout.text: "PERFUME IS A SYMPHONY, IT HAS A BEGINNING, MIDDLE AND AN END"
